div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://testSK.org/CodeSystem/afib-flutter-status-cs defines the following codes:

tr.td: Indicates that atrial fibrillation or flutter has been identified during screening or recent evaluation.
Signifies that the patient has a pre-existing, documented diagnosis of atrial fibrillation.
Denotes that the patient does not exhibit atrial fibrillation or atrial flutter.
Means that no screening for atrial fibrillation or flutter has been performed.

title.value: Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter Status Codes

description.value: Codes representing the status of Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter assessment.

definition.value: Indicates that atrial fibrillation or flutter has been identified during screening or recent evaluation.
Signifies that the patient has a pre-existing, documented diagnosis of atrial fibrillation.
Denotes that the patient does not exhibit atrial fibrillation or atrial flutter.
Means that no screening for atrial fibrillation or flutter has been performed.
